title: Smurfs
body: So whats been happening lately is that i keep coming up against smurfs in ranked games and wondering if you guys can try catch all smurfs by ip with a bot and try to keep them on their elo rather than making it unfair for a bronze player like me because i am bad at ranked

replies.body:
Its incredibly difficult to get rid of smurfs, and technically they aren't breaking any rules. 

>can try catch all smurfs by ip with a bot and try to keep them on their elo

I know a lot of players that share a computer and have varying ranks, not to mention internet cafes. 

Its also pretty hard to detect players that are smurfing. Some players have really good games/streaks of games where they play really well. Some people also pretend to be smurfs after doing really well in games (idk why) and give the name of a random high elo account/ a friends account. 

They don't just exist in low elo either. I'm plat 2 and get matched with players anywhere from plat 1- challenger in ranked. Most of my games have smurfs in them too. Just think of it as a learning opportunity, watch what they do. In the long run, the challenge will be better for you :D

>a random high elo account

The funniest "smurfs" are the ones that send you a name of someone, who is in game and playing at the same time.

I agree with you in theory, but in reality it's hard enough when you're covered in bronze or silver as it is. At least at you're level you have some idea of how to counter play and team work and builds which matters. Bronze don't and nor do they care. Anyway, at the end of the day, like you said it's hard to police and I'm sure Riot in their wisdom have thought about it or tried. So fair call and just do the best you can with what you got.

Ya its hard to jump into a game when you just wanna play and have fun but then you're getting your but kicked. After abut 10 minutes of figuring out how much better than us they are I just mentally give up and wait for 15 so I can spam that surrender button to move onto next game.

Ya its hard to jump into a game when you just wanna play and have fun but then you're getting your but kicked. After abut 10 minutes of figuring out how much better than us they are I just mentally give up and wait for 15 so I can spam that surrender button to move onto next game.

I don't think it's necessary to totally rid the game of smurfs. I don't see why accounts can't be linked and once a player reaches a certain elo on any account, it gets matched on any new accounts they make. It makes sense and it doesn't waste anyones time!

Its a fair enough point to remove smurfs but you can't effectively and efficiently do so. I feel your pain in the fact that they come into ranked games and ruin it but there is nothing that can be done. These days in low elo its based upon luck tbh to get out of Bronze.
playing against smurfs can also make you better at the game
Just because someone says they are a smurf, doesn't make them a smurf. (also you don't even play ranked.)
